question.qText: Everyone should change their clothes every day.

aBtn.aText: Everyone should change his clothes every day.
A person should change their clothes every day.
One should change their clothes every day.
No mistake

question.qText:
David wins the club tournament, but he received

no prize money and went home disappointed.

aBtn.aText: Change “wins” to “won.”
Change “received” to “receives.”
Change “home” to “back to his home.”
No mistake

question.qText:
Shakespeare wrote plays, Donne composed

poems, and essays were published by Addison.

aBtn.aText: Change “wrote” to “writes.”
Changes “composed” to “composes.”
Change “essays were published by Addison” to “Addison published essays.”
No mistake

question.qText:
Work on your research paper, and you may want

to study for the quiz.

aBtn.aText: You are working on your research paper, and you may want to study for the quiz.
You should work on your research paper and study for the quiz.
Work on your research paper and study for the quiz.
No mistake

question.qText:
Daniel helped his daughter with her math

homework, and the spelling list was reviewed with

her by him.

aBtn.aText: Daniel helped his daughter with her math homework, and the spelling list was reviewed by him with her.
Daniel helped his daughter with her math homework, and the spelling list was reviewed with her by Daniel.
Daniel helped his daughter with her math homework, and he reviewed the spelling with her.
No mistake

question.qText:
My sister's sorority raised a lot of money for a new

school in Sierra Leone, and new water lines were

paid for by the money also.

aBtn.aText: Change “raised” to “had raised.”
Replace the words “and new water lines were paid for by the money also” with “and paid for new water lines.”
Change the word “also” to “too.”
No mistake

question.qText:
Jason taught the yoga class, and the aerobics class

was led by Susan.

aBtn.aText: Change “Jason taught the yoga class” to “The yoga class was taught by Jason.”
Change “and” to “in addition”
Change “the aerobics class was led by Susan” to “Susan led the aerobics class.”
No mistake

question.qText:
John F. Kennedy said he wanted to have a man on

the moon before the end of the decade and he

does just that.

aBtn.aText: John F. Kennedy said he wanted to have a man on the moon before the end of the decade and he does do just that.
John F. Kennedy said he would want to have a man on the moon before the end of the decade and he does just that.
John F. Kennedy said he wanted to have a man on the moon before the end of the decade and he did just that.
No mistake

question.qText:
The birds flocked around the bird feeder that she

hangs on the olive tree.

aBtn.aText: The birds flocked around the bird feeder that she hung on the olive tree.
The birds had flocked around the bird feeder that she hangs on the olive tree.
The birds flocked around the bird feeder that she hang on the olive tree.
No mistake

question.qText:
If Jenny needs help on her composition

homework, Matthew helped her.

aBtn.aText: Change “If” to “When”
Remove the comma between the words “homework” and “Matthew”
Change “helped” to “helps”
No mistake
